word:
Elder Haskell and his wife have worked diligently in Fresno, and the Spirit of the Lord was wrought mightily for the people gathered there. The deep movings of the Spirit of God were felt by hundreds who were present, and 


                                    -154- 

the work of repentance and conversion is going through the church.--Letter 310, 1908, p. 1. (To Edson White, September 30, 1908.) 

Released May 23, 1974.
